TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you forget how to get into orbit.

I wish for .20 to come out right now.(looks around hopefully)

Granted. 0.20 has been released, but it was too late when you found out that the devs are just pranking everyone, and you've found yourself having another copy of 0.14.

I wish for pizza.

granted: the jelly beans and fruit snacks are laden with chemicals and you die from eating them. True story.

I wish for a sunny day.

At least I would die in pleasure

Granted, but it is missing toppings. And cheese. And sauce. And crust.

I wish that today's Doctor Who episode didn't end on another massive cliffhanger, forcing me to wait several months again before I can understand the current story arc

Edited May 19, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted. Ever see the US Life on Mars? It gets that crappy ending.

I wish for more Episodes of Girls und Panzer.

Granted but they are drawn on lined paper by a 5 year old.

I wish for a horse

Granted but it is made of anti-matter...

I wish that jupiter became a star

Granted, now humanity can settle on all it's moons............ cept Europa, go there and you get $#%*ed up

I wish that I had a Supermarine Spitfire...... that flies in space

Granted but there is a pressure leak and it exploads in space

I wish for more hours in the day

Granted, but the Earth's rotation is slowed down considerably to achieve this feat, causing everything not secured well enough to the ground to go flying off.

I wish that I could reverse-engineer a monolith.

Granted, within the monolith is highly advanced technology made by Europan aliens. This technology destroys everything it touches and then proceeds to destroy the whole planet.

I wish for a completely safe to eat pancake.

Granted, but it was made with the last Dodo egg, you alone have killed off an entire race.

I wish for Penny to live across the hall from me. (BBT)

Granted, Leonard kills you for looking at her.

I wish for a Supermarine Spitfire. I don't mind that it can't fly in space, a Spitfire is good enough.

Granted, but it also can't fly through air.

I wish for a Viper Mark II.

Granted, it comes with a Cylon.

I wish I had Ã‚Â£1450000, enough to buy my own Spitfire along with the fuel and facilities needed to fly it multiple times.

granted but hyperinflation happens and that money is worth Ã‚Â£1 and you become homeless due to poverty

i wish for more types of srbs

Granted, you now only get SRBs in sizes 0.01 to 0.05.

I wish I could time travel back to WW2.

Granted. You're stuck in a POW camp.

I wish the cylon that came with my Viper was friendly.

Granted, it turns hostile later on.

I wish for more users to be on and posting in the games forum.

(Also, being in a WW2 POW camp would be fun, trying to escape)

Granted ,but you are excuted ,and the second great kerbal forum happens to high amounts of people posting.

I wish when people make a wish they think it through.

Granted, but all the treads now move too fast and you're constantly sniped

[EDIT]: SEE!!!! What'd I just finish saying!!!!

(Someone has been watching too much Hogan's Heroes ;P)

-------------------------------

Granted, but with the intellect of a child

I wish I wasn't so tired right now

Granted, but you're now severely addicted to coffee.

I wish the local pizza place would get more customers, they're about to shut down.

Granted, but they become very popular and can't make the coffee fast enough.

I wish I could be a giant SRB.

granted but you get smashed into the ground by jeb within seconds

i wish to not have a spot on my nose

Granted, you have spots everywhere else.

I wish I could revise and not get distracted and post on the forums.
